catch_copy: Forget good or evil, it's all about cute girls and nonstop action! Enter a thrilling battleground where anime-style beauties clash in a stunning, cartoon-rendered girls' TPS!
description:
Enjoy dazzling graphics brought to life with toon-shaded, cartoon-style renderings and adorable anime girls! Each character radiates an energetic, heartwarming charm. Eye-catching visuals, a wide variety of costumes, and captivating character designs make gameplay even more fun.

・Battle your way through countless exciting stages, defeating enemies and collecting gold.
・Use your rewards to unlock a variety of outfits for the main characters, AERIE and her friend REINA.
・Complete special stages to unlock special mini-games.
・Complete all 10 waves of a mini-game to unlock exclusive illustrations.
・Explore an animated world where toon shaded cartoon rendering brings characters and backgrounds to life.

A squad of cute warrior girls is here! Gorgeous girls steal the spotlight in this visual feast of beauty and action. 
Featuring the reliable main character AERIE, the adorable REINA, a huge collection of stylish outfits, bonus mini-games, and an interactive character, this is the ultimate anime-girl TPS!
Download "Girls Squad: Style Wars" now and immerse yourself in a world of dazzling action and charming characters! Don't miss out on this special experience only available on Nintendo Switch™.

Prologue
The world has changed completely. The once dazzling, vibrant city is now shrouded in dull shades of gray. One day, a mysterious group of villains known as the Shadow Syndicate appeared and took control of the city.
Their goal? "Individuality is overrated. Everyone should wear the same clothes!" How ridiculous is that? But we couldn't just stand by and watch! That's where we come in - the Girls Squad!

I'm the leader, AERIE, of course! And my best friend REINA is right by my side. We were just normal students until one day we made a decision:
"We're going to take back this city and create the most stylish world ever!" Our mission is simple: defeat the enemies, earn money and buy new outfits. We'll reclaim our unique style and ultimately defeat the Shadow Syndicate to save the city!

So, are you ready? As a member of the Girls Squad, grab your weapons, put on your most fabulous outfit, and let's start this journey to save the city!
network_feature_description:
This software supports the following:
- Touch screen
